sentence.Network_en: Both women have dramatic dark looks and, reputedly, fiery temperaments.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个女人都皮肤黝黑，据说，脾气也很火暴。

sentence.Network_en: He reputedly earns two million pounds a year.
Chandler reputedly controlled more sideline rackets than anyone else on staff.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱德勒素以比饭店里其他职员有更多的生财之道而闻名.

PerfectNetExp.abs: reputed 名誉好的reputedly 据说request 请求

an ancient city of Egypt south of Cairo . reputedly founded by Menes , the first king of united Egypt , it retained its primacy until the conquest of Egypt by Alexander the Great . its remains include an extensive necropolis .孟菲斯埃及一古老城市，位于开罗以南。据说该城是由统一埃及的

list.abs: carat scooped the planning and buying account , reputedly worth US $ 450 million , following a final pitch against ZenithOptimedia .在与实力传播最后一轮的竞标之后，凯洛击败了实力传播赢得了据说价值4.5亿美元的策划和购买合约。
reputedly the building burned with fire for 2 years ago .据说该建筑物两年前毁于火灾。
As Stalin reputedly said , quantity has a quality all of own ., 就像斯大林的名言所说的那样 , 数量有着自己的质量.

entry.def: If you say that something is reputed to be true, you mean that people say it is true, but you do not know if it is definitely true.

example.ex: The monster, which is reputed to live in the deep dark water of a Scottish loch...
example.tran: 相传生活在苏格兰一个漆黑深水湖中的妖怪

means.word_mean: 1. by repute; according to general belief;

auth_sentence.content: The school is reputedly the best in the West Bank.
auth_sentence.res_content: The school is reputedly the best in the West Bank.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The school is reputedly the best in the West Bank.

auth_sentence.res_content: I say that Fifty Shades of Grey is reputedly based on the books.
